entry.title: sah pushed to master at saucelabs/sauce
entry.content:
• sah committed 5c75a05
    fixed long-standing bug in expediter!Failing to remove chefs we're about to assign to jobs from the masterready_chefs list during dispatching would cause them to be chosen forassignment for jobs on other browsers they also support, which couldin turn cause jobs not to be assigned when:1) we're busy2) with jobs that can be serviced by more than one type of chef3) for long enough for sushiboat to give up
  • sah committed c6c538e
    text found innon-ready state
  • sah committed 897a348
    Merge branch 'master' of github.com:saucelabs/sauce
  • sah committed f6ed616
    an idea from brainsik -- this is more interesting anyway

entry.title: sah pushed to master at sah/sauce
entry.content:
• sah committed 5c75a05
    fixed long-standing bug in expediter!Failing to remove chefs we're about to assign to jobs from the masterready_chefs list during dispatching would cause them to be chosen forassignment for jobs on other browsers they also support, which couldin turn cause jobs not to be assigned when:1) we're busy2) with jobs that can be serviced by more than one type of chef3) for long enough for sushiboat to give up
